txt.en: You have encountered the vile Gloomthorn. Roaming the Mirkwood, the corrupted Huorn lurks amongst the trees.
Gloomthorn can be found patrolling Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou have encountered the vile Gloomthorn. Roaming the Mirkwood, the corrupted Huorn lurks amongst the trees.
Roaming the Mirkwood, Gloomthorn lurks amongst the trees.
Gloomthorn can be found patrolling Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou have encountered the vile Gloomthorn. Roaming the Mirkwood, the corrupted Huorn lurks amongst the trees.
You have slain Gloomthorn and vanquished a threat to the safety of all those who dwell in Eryn Lasgalen.
